snippet: Technical failures blocked thousands of students who tried to log on to school during a snowstorm. At a City Council hearing on Wednesday, an IBM official said it wasn’t the company’s fault.
The chancellor said the “school system is more than prepared.” But when it was time to log on, many students could not.
